name: Did You Hear That?
description:
Visually impaired can play this game

In this game you are a scientist who was fiddling with a quantum device that exploded and tore down the universe.

Some dimensions were merged into one and you must try to repair it... but the most important thing is that all the senses except the hearing sense are neutralized.

So you can only trust in what you hear.

Using your ear you'll have to:

  • Dodge traps
  • Hear footsteps of enemies and shoot them
  • Survive enemy waves
  • And other things...
